csw:Record.dc:title: OceanSites, a worldwide system of deepwater reference station
csw:Record.dc:subject: /Physical Environment/Climatology

oceans
csw:Record.dct:abstract: The mission of OceanSITES is to collect, deliver and promote the use of high-quality data from long-term, high-frequency observations at fixed locations in the open ocean. OceanSITES typically aim to collect multidisciplinary data worldwide from the full-depth water column as well as the overlying atmosphere. OceanSITES delivers high-quality data from long-term, high-frequency observations at fixed locations in the open ocean.
